attributes.action: Brexit with freedom of movement and access to the single market.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to ask the UK government to consider compromising with both Remain and Leave voters in order to bring our country back together. 

I am a leave voter, and I hate to see the division and uncertainty created in our country. So I ask that leave voters and Remain voters compromise on the outcome of the referendum and allow freedom of movement with access to the single market.

I hope this petition will help bring the country back together.
attributes.background: In the recent referendum the country an d kingdom has been decided, EU citizens feel threatened over their right to live and work in the UK, Scotland may possibly hold a second referendum to leave the UK and the decision has caused a major division in our country.
